item.title: Coach 所有者 Tapestry 上调年度销售预期
item.description: 蔻驰母公司 Tapestry 周四第三次上调了 2025 财年的收入预期，主要得益于受特朗普全面关税影响有限，以及广受欢迎的 Tabby 手袋全价销售量增加。【原文：Coach parent Tapestry on Thursday raised its fiscal 2025 revenue forecast for the third time, benefiting from limited exposure to Trump's sweeping tariffs and higher full-price sale of its popular Tabby handbags.】

item.title: 芯片制造商中芯国际第一季度利润大增 161
item.description: 中国最大的合约芯片制造商中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司（Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp.【原文：Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp ，China's largest contract chip maker, reported on Thursday a 161.9% year-on-year surge in first-quarter profit.】

item.title: 汉堡王母公司 Restaurant Brands 季度收入不及预期
item.description: 受汉堡王（Burger King）等连锁餐厅需求疲软以及关税相关不确定性的影响，Restaurant Brands 周四未能实现第一季度营收预期。【原文：Restaurant Brands missed first-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday, hurt by weak demand at its restaurant chains such as Burger King against the backdrop of tariff-related uncertainty.】

item.title: 货币反弹，亚洲银行财富管理业务大增
item.description: 银行家和分析师表示，随着客户寻求美元资产的替代品，以及在贸易关税不确定的情况下对冲需求的增长，亚洲货币的大幅反弹必将推动对财富和外汇产品的需求。【原文：A sharp rally in Asian currencies is set to boost demand for wealth and forex products as clients seek alternatives to U.S. dollar-denominated assets and demand for hedging grows amid trade tariff uncertainties, bankers and analysts say.】

item.title: 百度 Apollo 与 Car Inc 合作推出自动驾驶汽车租赁服务
item.description: 中国科技巨头百度的智能驾驶部门 Apollo 周四表示，它将与当地汽车租赁公司 Car Inc 合作，推出 "首创 "的自动驾驶汽车租赁服务。【原文：Chinese tech giant Baidu's smart driving unit Apollo said on Thursday that it would team up with local auto rental firm Car Inc to launch a "first-of-its-kind" autonomous driving rental service.】

item.title: 特朗普修复空中交通管制的计划面临巨大障碍
item.description: 美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周四将呼吁投入数百亿美元，对美国紧张的空中交通管制系统进行全面检修，以解决基础设施摇摇欲坠、人员严重短缺和技术故障等问题。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy on Thursday will call for tens of billions of dollars to overhaul America’s strained air traffic control system to address crumbling infrastructure, dramatic staffing shortfalls and failing technology.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份天然气液化物出口量创历史新高
item.description: 船舶跟踪数据显示，即使中美之间的贸易战削减了美国对第一大买家的出货量，美国 4 月份的天然气液出口仍创下了历史新高。【原文：U.S. exports of natural gas liquids touched a record high in April, even as a trade war between the U.S. and China cut shipments to the top buyer, ship tracking data showed.】

item.title: 斯坦查特称其贸易网络可抵御特朗普关税干扰
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周四表示，其专注于贸易的业务已做好充分准备，以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全球关税带来的干扰。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Thursday its trade-focused business was well positioned to cope with disruption from U.S. President Donald Trump's global tariffs.】

item.title: 切尼尔公司第一季度收入因液化天然气需求强劲和天然气价格上涨而增长
item.description: 美国液化天然气出口商切尼尔能源公司（Cheniere Energy）周四公布第一季度液化天然气收入增加，主要得益于对超冷燃料的需求增加和天然气价格上涨。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas exporter Cheniere Energy reported higher first-quarter LNG revenue on Thursday, helped by higher demand for the superchilled fuel and rise in natural gas prices.】

item.title: 特朗普的减税政策能否永久化？关税、支出之争为局势蒙上阴影
item.description: 共和党希望将唐纳德-特朗普总统 2017 年的所有减税政策永久化，但这一希望在国会岌岌可危，因为立法者们正在努力就如何支付这些减税政策达成一致，而特朗普的贸易战和移民打压也使经济增长前景黯淡。【原文：Republican hopes of making all of President Donald Trump's 2017 tax cuts permanent are in jeopardy in Congress, as lawmakers struggle to agree on how to pay for them and Trump's trade war and immigration crackdown dim the prospect of economic growth.】

item.title: Workday 未通过竞争性招标就获得了裁员背后的美国机构的合同
item.description: 亿万富翁特朗普顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）削减联邦雇员的核心机构--联邦人力资源机构表示，该机构已将新的基于云的人力资源平台合同授予Workday公司，而没有寻求竞争对手的投标。【原文：The federal HR agency at the heart of billionaire Trump advisor Elon Musk's efforts to slash the federal workforce says it has awarded a contract for a new cloud-based HR platform to Workday without seeking bids from rivals.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，比亚迪的目标是到 2030 年将一半汽车销往中国以外地区
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的人士透露，中国第一大汽车制造商比亚迪的目标是到 2030 年将一半的汽车销往中国以外的市场。【原文：BYD, China's No. 1 automaker , aims to sell half of its vehicles outside the Chinese market by 2030, a massive increase that would make it a rival to the world's largest automakers, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国股市期货攀升，有望达成关税暂停以来的首个贸易协议
item.description: 由于对特朗普政府即将在贸易政策上取得突破持乐观态度，美国股指期货周四上涨，而芯片类股则在有消息称减少出口限制的计划即将出台后上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday over optimism that the Trump administration was on the cusp of a breakthrough on trade policy, while chip stocks gained after news that a plan for fewer export curbs was in the offing.】

item.title: 美国人工智能高管将向国会提交击败中国的政策愿望清单
item.description: 美国人工智能巨头OpenAI、微软和AMD的高层管理人员将于本周四出席美国参议院听证会，并概述他们认为华盛顿在人工智能竞赛中可以领先北京的方法。【原文：Top executives at American AI giants OpenAI, Microsoft and AMD are set to appear at a U.S. Senate hearing on Thursday and outline ways they believe Washington can stay ahead of Beijing in the artificial intelligence race.】

item.title: 咨询公司称，由于不确定性普遍存在，华尔街奖金将减少
item.description: 薪酬咨询公司 Johnson Associates 的报告显示，由于经济和地缘政治的不确定性阻碍了交易的达成，预计今年华尔街的奖金将下滑。【原文：Wall Street bonuses are expected to slide this year as economic and geopolitical uncertainty stall deal-making, according to a report by compensation consultancy Johnson Associates.】

item.title: 凯雷利润因收费增长和创纪录的管理资产而攀升
item.description: 全球投资公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周四公布第一季度利润增长 5.6%，主要得益于其管理资产攀升至创纪录水平，费用增加。【原文：Global investment firm Carlyle Group posted a 5.6% growth in first-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by higher fees as its assets under management climbed to a record.】

item.title: 垂直宇航公司与霍尼韦尔深化合作，使关键的空中出租车系统通过认证
item.description: 英国电动飞机公司垂直宇航公司（Vertical Aerospace）周四表示，根据一项新的长期协议，该公司已扩大了与霍尼韦尔的合作关系，以帮助认证其 VX4 空中出租车的关键系统。【原文：British electric-aircraft firm Vertical Aerospace said on Thursday it has expanded its partnership with Honeywell under a new long-term deal to help certify key systems for its VX4 air taxi.】

item.title: 独家报道马斯克退居幕后，DOGE领导的软件改革仍将加速美国裁员进程
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）裁减联邦工作人员的核心机构--联邦人力资源机构准备推出软件，以加快美国政府的裁员速度。【原文：The federal human resources agency at the heart of billionaire Elon Musk's efforts to slash the federal workforce is poised to roll out software to speed layoffs across the U.S. government, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 预期疲软加剧投资者担忧，Arm 股价暴跌
item.description: 受全球贸易紧张局势影响，芯片技术供应商 Arm Holdings 公布了疲软的季度营收和利润预期，成为半导体行业中最新一家公布这一预期的公司，该公司股价在周四的盘前交易中下挫超过 10%。【原文：Arm Holdings shares sank more than 10% in premarket trade on Thursday after the chip tech provider became the latest in the semiconductor industry to provide a weak quarterly revenue and profit forecast due to global trade tensions.】

item.title: 美国关税不确定性影响英飞凌收入前景
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies）周四报告了稳定的订单量，但由于全球关税争端的不确定性，该公司下调了全年收入展望。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon Technologies reported stable order intake on Thursday but lowered its full-year revenue outlook due to uncertainty over global tariff disputes.】

item.title: Prosus 预计全年电子商务利润将超过 4 亿美元的指导目标
item.description: 荷兰技术投资者 Prosus NV 首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 周四表示，预计本财年其电子商务业务的调整后利润将超过预期，达到 4.35 亿美元。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus NV expects adjusted profit at its e-commerce business to exceed its guidance and reach $435 million this fiscal year, Chief Executive Fabricio Bloisi said on Thursday.】

item.title: 台湾 4 月出口在美国加征关税前猛增 30%，上半年表现强劲
item.description: 台湾 4 月份出口增幅超过预期，原因是客户在美国任何关税生效前囤积了台湾的高科技产品，这可能推动上半年出口创下新高。【原文：Taiwan's exports rose more than expected in April as customers stockpiled the island's high-tech products before any U.S. tariffs take effect, which could drive first-half exports to a new high.】

item.title: 欧洲央行经济学家称外籍劳工是欧元区经济增长的主要动力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的一项研究周四得出结论说，自大流行病以来，外籍工人在欧元区经济增长中占了很大比重，他们可以帮助欧元区克服劳动力市场老龄化和萎缩所带来的经济制约。【原文：Foreign workers accounted for much of the euro zone's economic growth since the pandemic and could help the bloc overcome the economic constraints of an ageing and shrinking labour market, a European Central Bank study concluded on Thursday.】

item.title: 受关税影响，美国集装箱进口连增近乎创纪录的势头预计将在5月戛然而止
item.description: 美国集装箱进口量在四月份激增，因为各公司竞相规避唐纳德-特朗普总统征收的关税，其中包括对来自中国的商品征收 145% 的关税，但美国两个最繁忙港口的高管们表示，这一趋势在五月份有望逆转。【原文：U.S. container imports surged in April as companies raced to avoid President Donald Trump's tariffs, which now include a 145% duty on goods from China, but executives at the country's two busiest ports said the trend looked set to reverse in May.】

item.title: 中国华为将推出首款搭载自主研发的 "和谐 "操作系统的笔记本电脑
item.description: 中国华为公司周四在社交媒体上发布消息称，该公司将于 5 月 19 日推出首款搭载自主研发的 Harmony 操作系统的笔记本电脑。【原文：China's Huawei will launch its first laptop with the self-developed Harmony operating system on May 19, the company said in a social media post on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC-TV18 报道，印度同意有条件批准 "星链 "在该国运营
item.description: 据CNBC-TV18电视新闻频道周四报道，印度政府已同意有条件批准SpaceX公司的Starlink开始在该国提供基于卫星的互联网服务。【原文：The Indian government has agreed to a conditional nod for SpaceX's Starlink to start offering satellite-based internet services in the country, television news channel CNBC-TV18 reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 博世 2025 年有机销售额增长 1%-3%，受市场疲软影响有所放缓
item.description: 德国汽车供应商罗伯特-博世 [RIC:RIC:ROBG.UL]周四表示，预计2025年销售额将按汇率调整后增长1%至3%。【原文：German automotive supplier Robert Bosch [RIC:RIC:ROBG.UL] said on Thursday it expects 2025 sales to grow a currency-adjusted 1% to 3%.】

item.title: 台湾华航订购 14 架波音 777X 飞机
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，台湾中华航空公司订购了 14 架波音 777X 宽体飞机。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday that Taiwan's China Airlines placed an order for 14 Boeing 777X wide-body planes.】

item.title: 中国百度寻求为人工智能系统破解动物叫声申请专利
item.description: 有没有想过能听懂猫咪想告诉你什么？一家中国科技公司正在探索是否有可能利用人工智能将这些神秘的喵喵声翻译成人类语言。【原文：Ever wished you could understand what your cat is trying to tell you? A Chinese tech company is exploring whether it's possible to translate those mysterious meows into human language using artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 预计美英两国将于周四宣布关税协议
item.description: 预计美国和英国将于周四宣布一项降低部分商品关税的协议，这是自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对世界各国征收关税以来达成的首个此类协议。【原文：The United States and Britain are expected to announce a deal to lower tariffs on some goods on Thursday, the first such agreement since U.S. President Donald Trump imposed levies on countries around the world.】
